sourcesContent:
// const routes = require('next-routes')
const routes = (module.exports = require('next-routes')());

routes                   // about  about     /about
    .add('home', '/home', 'index')                             // about  about     /about
    // .add('home', '/home', 'index')                             // about  about     /about
    .add('about', '/about')                             // about  about     /about
    .add('category.index', '/categorieen', '/categorieen')                         // blog   blog      /blog/:slug
    .add('category.show', '/categorie/:id', '/categorie/')                  // about  about     /about
    .add('post', '/post/:id', '/post')                         // blog   blog      /blog/:slug
    .add('user', '/user/:id', 'profile')                // user   profile   /user/:id
    .add('/:noname/:lang(en|es)/:wow+', 'complex')      // (none) complex   /:noname/:lang(en|es)/:wow+
    .add({name: 'beta', pattern: '/v3', page: 'v3'})    // beta   v3        /v3
